item.title: maria add a quote by Shah Rukh Khan
item.description: "Walk on with hope in your heart, and you'll never walk alone" -- Shah Rukh Khan

item.title: maria add a quote by Karan Johar
item.description: "never to say goodbye coz it kills the hope of meeting again." -- Karan Johar

item.title: maria add a quote by نمی دانم
item.description: " هرگز زانو نمیزنم................. حتی اگر آسمان کوتاهتر از قد من باشد " -- نمی دانم

item.title: maria add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: maria add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: maria add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: maria add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: maria add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: maria add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I do not want people to be very agreeable, as it saves me the trouble of liking them a great deal." -- Jane Austen

item.title: maria add a quote by Henry James
item.description: "Three things in human life are important: the first is to be kind; the second is to be kind; and the third is to be kind." -- Henry James

item.title: maria add a quote by Victor Hugo
item.description: "من نميگويم هرگز نبايد در نگاه اول عاشق شد اما اعتقاد دارم بايد براي بار دوم هم نگاه کرد" -- Victor Hugo

item.title: maria add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: maria add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: maria add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Life is too short, or too long, for me to allow myself the luxury of living it so badly." -- Paulo Coelho
